name: Guts Drip RPG: A tale before disaster
name_original: Guts Drip RPG: A tale before disaster
description:
Introduction:

Another entry in the beloved DRIP RPG series. This game takes place after dripnugger (https://www.deviantart.com/dripnugger) comics but before Goku Drip RPG (https://mrp1nk.itch.io/goku-drip-rpg-feat-ed-from-osuro). Find out Gatsus backstory in this stylish exciting context for another game and blah blah blah DRIP blah blah blah.

Features:

-DRIP

-classy RPG elements

-emotional dialogue driven impactful masterfully written story

-lighting chained anti-aliasing

-giant world to explore

-complex and intuitive combat system

-Berserk

Credits:

Pitch: Pclbt

Executive Producer: dripnugger (deviantart)

Game Direction: Mr. P1nk

Quality Control: dripnugger (deviantart)

Creative Vision Supervisor: dripnugger (deviantart)

Programming/Coding: Mr. P1nk

Story/Writing: Mr. P1nk

Music: we don't own any of the music except the last track

Special Thanks to: dripnugger for comic art

made with: ren'py (?)

The only serious project I posted kinda flopped so I am back to shitposting
